21: אֱמֹ֣ר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Speak</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>unto the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֮ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִה֒ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>I am about</n> מְחַלֵּ֤ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>Behold I will profane</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>my sanctuary</n> גְּא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>the excellency</n> עֻזְּכֶ֔ם <sup>5797 </sup> <n>of your strength</n> מַחְמַ֥ד <sup>4261 </sup> <n>the desire</n> עֵֽינֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>of your eyes</n> וּמַחְמַ֣ל <sup>4263 </sup> <n>pitieth</n> נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and that which your soul</n> וּבְנֵיכֶ֧ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and your sons</n> וּבְנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and your daughters</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> עֲזַבְתֶּ֖ם <sup>5800 </sup> <n>whom ye have left</n> בַּחֶ֥רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n>
22: וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>And ye shall do</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> עָשִׂ֑יתִי <sup>6213 </sup> <n>as I have done</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שָׂפָם֙ <sup>8222 </sup> <n>[your] lips</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>you will not</n> תַעְט֔וּ <sup>5844 </sup> <n>ye shall not cover</n> וְלֶ֥חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>the bread</n> אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>of men</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and you will not</n> תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>nor eat</n>

24: וְהָיָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Thus</n> יְחֶזְקֵ֤אל <sup>3168 </sup> <n>Thus Ezekiel</n> לָכֶם֙ לְמוֹפֵ֔ת <sup>4159 </sup> <n>is unto you a sign</n> כְּכֹ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>according to all that he hath done</n> תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall ye do</n> בְּבֹאָ֕הּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and when this cometh</n> וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>ye shall know</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>that I [am] the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> ס
25: וְאַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Also thou son</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> הֲל֗וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not be on</n> בְּי֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[shall it] not [be] in the day</n> קַחְתִּ֤י <sup>3947 </sup> <n>when I take</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מָ֣עוּזָּ֔ם <sup>4581 </sup> <n>from them their strength</n> מְשׂ֖וֹשׂ <sup>4885 </sup> <n>the joy</n> תִּפְאַרְתָּ֑ם <sup>8597 </sup> <n>of their glory</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַחְמַ֤ד <sup>4261 </sup> <n>the desire</n> עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>of their eyes</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַשָּׂ֣א <sup>4853 </sup> <n>and that whereupon they set</n> נַפְשָׁ֔ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>their minds</n> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>their sons</n> וּבְנוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and their daughters</n>
26: בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> הַפָּלִ֖יט <sup>6412 </sup> <n>[That] he that escapeth</n> אֵלֶ֑יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> לְהַשְׁמָע֖וּת <sup>2045 </sup> <n>unto thee to cause [thee] to hear</n> אָזְנָֽיִם׃ <sup>241 </sup> <n>that</n>
27: בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִפָּ֤תַח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>be opened</n> פִּ֙יךָ֙ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>shall thy mouth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַפָּלִ֔יט <sup>6412 </sup> <n>to him which is escaped</n> וּתְדַבֵּ֕ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and thou shalt speak</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תֵֽאָלֵ֖ם <sup>481 </sup> <n>and be no more dumb</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> וְהָיִ֤יתָ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָהֶם֙ לְמוֹפֵ֔ת <sup>4159 </sup> <n>and thou shalt be a sign</n> וְיָדְע֖וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>unto them and they shall know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I [am] the LORD</n> ס
